GSD.description:
firmware: arm_scpi: Ensure scpi_info is not assigned if the probe fails

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 0c29e149b6bb498778ed8a1c9597b51acfba7856. For more details please see the references link.
